careers.title: Work with Us
careers.description: Here are the positions we are looking to fill in the Nice Adventures team.
reasons: We are looking for members to join our team for the next years; this is a commitment that will provide long-term job stability.
We offer a friendly work environment, with no crunch, organized work methodologies, no sudden changes in direction, and no arbitrary deadlines.
We have a Personal Improvement program where we identify your goals and do what we can to help you achieve them.
We are working on a cool game, and you can be a part of it.
careers.footer: We are creating an amazing game, and we need your help to continue. If you are interested in this position, fill out the form.

products.title: Adventure in Henders Castle
products.description: We're actively developing Adventure in Henders Castle, a fully immersive 3D action-adventure game hat boasts intricate systems‚Äîfrom detailed inventory and skill management to dynamic world streaming and robust localization support.

products.title: IA Webpage Generator
products.description: Our AI-enabled content generation platform ingests information from various sources and automatically posts content to WordPress/Wix/Shopify websites. This simple yet effective tool amplifies the output of a single person managing multiple sites. The project leveraged OpenAI API integrations, sophisticated information embedding, and a streamlined workflow that takes content from prompt to publication. we also implemented a ‚Äúprivate GPT‚Äù that works by allowing users to use LLMs but keep conversations private on their own servers.

products.title: Chat Tool

products.title: Fulepu - The Game
products.description: We developed an online multiplayer trivia game tailored for educational purposes. Featuring an animated host who delivers questions and celebrates player achievements, the platform also supports multimedia responses including photos, videos, and audio recordings.

products.title: Excel game
products.description: A small game that we developed to test our skills. A commissioned prototype for a game that teaches the most common excel shortcuts. Available to play online. Made using HTML and javascript.
